title: Allegheny Portage Railroad National Historic Site: Management
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management             Management       Â   Interpretive Planning  Social Media Policy for Allegheny Portage Railroad NHS (pdf)  A Long Range Interpretive Plan (LRIP) provides a 5-10 year vision for a park's interpretive program.     Allegheny Portage Railroad Comprehensive Interpretive Plan Planning Documents Scanned for your use include:  Historic Structure Report Staple Bend Tunnel Lemon House 1968 Historic Structures Report Lemon House 1980 Furnishing Report Lemon House 1994 Furnishing Report
